title.narrative: Economic Empowerment of Youth with Disabilities

description.narrative: The economic empowerment of female and male youth with disabilities in Buliisa, Hoima, Masindi, Kiryandongo and Nwoya districts in Uganda

participating-org.narrative: Ministry of Education and Sports - Uganda
Ministry of Gender, Labour and Social Development - Uganda
National Union of Disabled Persons of Uganda (NUDIPU)
Uganda National Association of the Blind (UNAB)

sector.narrative: Basic Life Skills for Youth and Adults
